languages.text: "Все близлежащие палубы оцеплены, начаты поисковые мероприятия, а на офицерской палубе развернут штаб дознания. Анализ субстанции показал, что это кровь, несущая следы серьезных мутаций. Субстанция не несет риска заражения для вас, но само наличие генетической мерзости такой степени на корабле — величайшая угроза безопасности всего судна, которую нельзя оставлять без внимания. Многие на корабле, узнав о произошедшем сегодня, сочтут, что вашему статусу {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Вольного Торговца{/g} был брошен дерзкий вызов".

"All adjacent decks have been isolated. We have begun our search for the culprit, and have set up investigation headquarters on the officers' deck. The substance has been analysed and confirmed to be blood containing traces of major mutations. While it poses no risk of infection to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the very presence of such genetic aberration on board is a serious threat to the safety of the ship and must be addressed promptly. Once word of this gets out, many among the crew will surely see it as a brazen challenge to your status as {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Все близлежащие палубы оцеплены, начаты поисковые мероприятия, а на офицерской палубе развернут штаб дознания. traits.locale_text: "All adjacent decks have been isolated. We have begun our search for the culprit and set up investigation headquarters on the officers' deck. The substance has been analysed and confirmed to be blood containing traces of major mutations, Category Five or higher. It poses no risk of infection to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, however, the very presence of such genetic anathema on board is a grave threat to the ship that must be addressed promptly. Upon hearing word of today's events, many among the crew will see it as a brazen affront to your status as Rogue Trader."

languages.text: «Todas las cubiertas adyacentes están aisladas. La búsqueda del culpable ya está en marcha y hemos establecido un cuartel de investigación en la cubierta de oficiales. El análisis de la sustancia ha confirmado que se trata de sangre con rastros de mutación severa. Aunque no existe riesgo de infección para mi{mf|lord|lady}, la mera presencia de esta aberración genética a bordo es una amenaza grave a la seguridad de la nave y debe resolverse de inmediato. En cuanto se extienda la noticia, muchos miembros de la tripulación lo considerarán un desafío muy osado a su posición como {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Comerciante Independiente{/g}».
languages.original_text: "All adjacent decks have been isolated. We have begun our search for the culprit, and have set up investigation headquarters on the officers' deck. The substance has been analysed and confirmed to be blood containing traces of major mutations. While it poses no risk of infection to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the very presence of such genetic aberration on board is a serious threat to the safety of the ship and must be addressed promptly. Once word of this gets out, many among the crew will surely see it as a brazen challenge to your status as {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g}."

languages.text: 「すべての隣接デッキは隔離されました。犯人の捜索を開始し、士官デッキに捜査本部を設置いたしました。物質分析の結果、主要な変異の痕跡を含む血液であることが確認されております。陛下に感染の危険はございませんが、このような忌まわしきものが船内に存在することは、船の安全に対する重大な脅威であり、早急に対処しなければなりません。 ひとたびこのことが知れ渡れば、クルーの多くは、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}自由開拓者{/g}としてのお立場に対する大胆な挑戦と見なすに違いありません」
languages.original_text: "All adjacent decks have been isolated. We have begun our search for the culprit, and have set up investigation headquarters on the officers' deck. The substance has been analysed and confirmed to be blood containing traces of major mutations. While it poses no risk of infection to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the very presence of such genetic aberration on board is a serious threat to the safety of the ship and must be addressed promptly. Once word of this gets out, many among the crew will surely see it as a brazen challenge to your status as {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「すべての隣接デッキは隔離されました。犯人の捜索を開始し、士官デッキに捜査本部を設置いたしました。物質分析の結果、主要な変異の痕跡を含む血液であることが確認されております。陛下に感染の危険はございませんが、このような忌まわしきものが船内に存在することは、船の安全に対する重大な脅威であり、早急に対処しなければなりません。 ひとたびこのことが知れ渡れば、クルーの多くは、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}自由開拓者{/g}としてのお立場に対する大胆な挑戦と見なすに違いありません」

languages.text: “所有邻近甲板都已经进行了隔离。我们开始搜寻叛乱分子，还在军官甲板上设立了调查总部。分析结果显示，该物质为血液，血液中残存着极其严重的突变痕迹。尽管这种物质不会对大人您造成感染，但这种邪恶的基因肯定会对船的安全构成严重威胁，这个问题必须立刻解决。一旦这件事情传出去，肯定会有很多船员认为有人胆敢公开挑战您身为{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}行商浪人{/g}的地位。”
languages.original_text: "All adjacent decks have been isolated. We have begun our search for the culprit, and have set up investigation headquarters on the officers' deck. The substance has been analysed and confirmed to be blood containing traces of major mutations. While it poses no risk of infection to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the very presence of such genetic aberration on board is a serious threat to the safety of the ship and must be addressed promptly. Once word of this gets out, many among the crew will surely see it as a brazen challenge to your status as {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “所有邻近甲板都已经进行了隔离。我们开始搜寻叛乱分子，还在军官甲板上设立了调查总部。分析结果显示，该物质为血液，血液中残存着极其严重的突变痕迹。尽管这种物质不会对大人您造成感染，但这种邪恶的基因肯定会对船的安全构成严重威胁，这个问题必须立刻解决。一旦这件事情传出去，肯定会有很多船员认为有人胆敢公开挑战您身为{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}行商浪人{/g}的地位。”

languages.text: "Alle angrenzenden Decks wurden isoliert. Wir haben die Suche nach dem Täter eingeleitet und auf dem Offiziersdeck eine Untersuchungszentrale eingerichtet. Die Substanz wurde analysiert und als Blut mit Spuren größerer Mutationen bestätigt. Es besteht zwar kein Infektionsrisiko für Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber allein die Präsenz eines derartigen genetischen Abscheulichkeit an Bord ist eine ernsthafte Bedrohung für die Sicherheit des Schiffs und muss umgehend beseitigt werden. Sollte das bekannt werden, werden große Teile der Crew darin eine dreiste Herausforderung Eures Status als {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Freihändler{/g} sehen."
languages.original_text: "All adjacent decks have been isolated. We have begun our search for the culprit, and have set up investigation headquarters on the officers' deck. The substance has been analysed and confirmed to be blood containing traces of major mutations. While it poses no risk of infection to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the very presence of such genetic aberration on board is a serious threat to the safety of the ship and must be addressed promptly. Once word of this gets out, many among the crew will surely see it as a brazen challenge to your status as {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Alle angrenzenden Decks wurden isoliert. Wir haben die Suche nach dem Täter eingeleitet und auf dem Offiziersdeck eine Untersuchungszentrale eingerichtet. Die Substanz wurde analysiert und als Blut mit Spuren größerer Mutationen bestätigt. Es beseht zwar kein Infektionsrisiko für Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber allein die Präsenz eines derartigen genetischen Abscheulichkeit an Bord ist eine ernsthafte Bedrohung für die Sicherheit des Schiffs und muss umgehend beseitigt werden. Sollte das bekannt werden, werden große Teile der Crew darin eine dreiste Herausforderung Eures Status als {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Freihändler{/g} sehen."

languages.text: « Tous les ponts adjacents ont été isolés. Nous nous sommes mis en quête du coupable et avons établi un quartier général sur le pont des officiers. L'analyse de la substance a confirmé qu'il s'agissait de sang contenant des traces de mutations majeures. Il ne présente aucun risque infectieux, mais la présence d'une telle aberration génétique à bord est une menace pour la sécurité du vaisseau à laquelle il nous faut absolument remédier, car si cela venait à se savoir, certains membres de l'équipage y verraient une bonne excuse pour remettre votre statut de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} en question. »
languages.original_text: "All adjacent decks have been isolated. We have begun our search for the culprit, and have set up investigation headquarters on the officers' deck. The substance has been analysed and confirmed to be blood containing traces of major mutations. While it poses no risk of infection to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the very presence of such genetic aberration on board is a serious threat to the safety of the ship and must be addressed promptly. Once word of this gets out, many among the crew will surely see it as a brazen challenge to your status as {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Tous les ponts adjacents ont été isolés. Nous nous sommes mis en quête du coupable et avons établi un quartier général sur le pont des officiers. L'analyse de la substance a confirmé qu'il s'agissait de sang contenant des traces de mutations majeures. Il ne présente aucun risque infectieux, mais la présence d'une telle aberration génétique à bord est une menace pour la sécurité du vaisseau à laquelle il nous faut absolument remédier, car si cela venait à se savoir, certains membres de l'équipage y verraient une bonne excuse pour remettre votre statut de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} en question. »

languages.text: "Tüm bitişik güverteler tecrit edildi. Faili aramaya başladık ve subay güvertesinde inceleme merkezi kurduk. Maddenin analizi yapıldı ve içinde ağır mutasyon izleri bulunan bir kan örneği olduğu onaylandı. Her ne kadar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri için enfeksiyon riski taşımasa da gemide böylesi bir genetik sapkının mevcut olması, geminin güvenliği için ciddi bir tehdit. Gereken derhâl yapılacak. Bu duyulduğu anda mürettebattan birçoklarının bunu {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Hür Tacir{/g} olarak statünüze karşı yapılmış, açık bir meydan okuma olarak göreceği kesin."
languages.original_text: "All adjacent decks have been isolated. We have begun our search for the culprit, and have set up investigation headquarters on the officers' deck. The substance has been analysed and confirmed to be blood containing traces of major mutations. While it poses no risk of infection to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, the very presence of such genetic aberration on board is a serious threat to the safety of the ship and must be addressed promptly. Once word of this gets out, many among the crew will surely see it as a brazen challenge to your status as {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTraderGlossary}Rogue Trader{/g}."
